item.title: AMD’s Q4 revenue hits $7.66B, up 24% but stock falls
item.description: Advanced Micro Devices reported revenue of $7.658 billion for the fourth quarter, up 24% from a year ago.

item.title: OmniHuman: ByteDance’s new AI creates realistic videos from a single photo
item.description: OmniHuman can turn photos into realistic videos of people speaking, singing and moving naturally, based on 18,700 hours of human motion data.

item.title: Adobe Acrobat AI now reads and explains your contracts in minutes — here’s how it works
item.description: Adobe Acrobat's new AI assistant analyzes complex contracts, answers questions and explains legal terms in plain language.

item.title: Chip sales are set to soar in 2025 — so long as there isn’t a trade war | Deloitte
item.description: Deloitte said chip sales will soar in 2025, led by GenAI and data center build-outs, even as demand from PC and mobile markets may be weak.

item.title: Open-source revolution: How DeepSeek-R1 challenges OpenAI’s o1 with superior processing, cost efficiency
item.description: We dive deep into hands-on testing, practical implications and actionable insights to help you understand which model best suits their needs.
